column4: how do i run my packge(directory) full of class files from command line on linux? i get ClassNotFoundException. ive tried to set CLASSPATH, ive tried to copy all the class files to the same dir that the java bin is in, not sure what i'm doing wrong and google isnt helping me either
Is this a java program you wrote?
i wrote all of my classes in separate files then they're all apart of the same package
